original_title: President agrees to postpone Central Bank Amendment Bill: Sajith
original_body_lines: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa said President Ranil Wickremesinghe today agreed to postpone the Central Bank Amendment Bill which is fixed for debate this Thursday (11).
The Opposition Leader told Parliament that the President agreed to do so when he contacted him over the phone this morning.
"I requested the President to postpone the Bill and allow for a broad discussion over it," he said.
Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena said a decision would be taken at the Business Committe meeting today to postpone the Central Bank Amendment Bill. (Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
